titleStmt.title: Die Jovis, 6 Januarii. 1647. Additionall directions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the billetting of the army, when they are upon a march, or setled in their quarters.
Proceedings. 1648-03-06
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
